aboutSettings.developWarning.defaultMessage: You are running the develop branch of Streamarr, which is only recommended for those contributing to development or assisting with bleeding-edge testing.

cache.description.defaultMessage: Streamarr caches requests to external API endpoints to optimize performance and avoid making unnecessary API calls.

hero.inviteCode.defaultMessage: Enter your invite code to get started

hero.subtitle.defaultMessage: Watch anywhere, anytime for free. The future is now.

imageCache.description.defaultMessage: Streamarr will proxy and cache images from pre-configured external sources. Cached images are saved into your config folder. You can find the files in {cachePath}

invite.disabledError.defaultMessage: Something went wrong while disabling the invite.

invite.error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong while {action} the invite.

inviteList.signUpDisabledMessage.defaultMessage: The admin has currently disabled the sign up feature. No new invites can be created.

inviteShare.shareDescription.defaultMessage: Share this invite link or QR code with your friends!

jobs.description.defaultMessage: Streamarr performs certain maintenance tasks as regularly-scheduled jobs, but they can also be manually triggered below. Manually running a job will not alter its schedule.

jobs.editError.defaultMessage: Something went wrong while saving the job.

jobs.everyMinutes.defaultMessage: Every {count, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}}

jobs.everySeconds.defaultMessage: Every {count, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}}

localSignup.passwordMinLength.defaultMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters

localSignup.usernameInvalidChars.defaultMessage: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

localSignup.usernameMaxLength.defaultMessage: Username must be less than 20 characters

localSignup.usernameMinLength.defaultMessage: Username must be at least 3 characters

logs.description.defaultMessage: You can also view these logs directly via {stdout}, or in {logPath}

moreHelp.checkHelpSection.defaultMessage: Check out the help section on Plex or reach out below!

moreHelp.plexHelpDescription.defaultMessage: Take a look at the Plex Help section or browse their forums for even more assistance.

notFound.quote.defaultMessage: There are places out there you can't find on any map. They're not gone, they're just lost.

notification.inviteUsedSuccessfully.desc.defaultMessage: Get notified when an invite you sent has been successfully redeemed

plexImport.error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong while importing Plex users.

plexImport.newSignIn.warning.defaultMessage: The Enable New Plex Sign-In setting is currently enabled. Plex users with library access do not need to be imported in order to sign in.

plexImport.noUsers.defaultMessage: No users were imported from Plex.

plexImport.noUsersToImport.defaultMessage: There are no Plex users to import.

plexImport.success.defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {# Plex user} other {# Plex users}} imported successfully!

plexSettings.description.defaultMessage: Configure the settings for your Plex server. Streamarr scans your Plex libraries to generate menus and share to invited users.

plexSettings.libraries.description.defaultMessage: The libraries Streamarr will use. Set up and save your Plex connection settings, then click the button below if no libraries are listed.

plexSettings.loadServersPrompt.defaultMessage: Press the button to load available servers

plexSettings.retrieveServersError.defaultMessage: Failed to retrieve Plex server list.

plexSettings.setupInstructions.defaultMessage: To set up Plex, you can either enter the details manually or select a server retrieved from {plexLink}. Press the button to the right of the dropdown to fetch the list of available servers.

plexSettings.urlBaseTooltip.defaultMessage: It is recommended to leave this as the default value

plexSettings.webAppDescription.defaultMessage: The Plex web app must be located on the same domain as to avoid cross-origin issues.

radarrSettings.deleteconfirm.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this server?

radarrSettings.description.defaultMessage: Configure your Radarr server(s) below. You can connect multiple Radarr servers, but only two of them can be marked as defaults (one non-4K and one 4K). Administrators are able to override the server(s) used to process new events.

radarrSettings.no4kdefault.defaultMessage: A 4K Radarr server must be marked as default in order to enable new 4K Radarr events.

radarrSettings.noDefaultServer.defaultMessage: At least one Radarr server must be marked as default in order for movie events to be processed.

radarrSettings.single4kWarning.defaultMessage: If you only have a single Radarr server for both non-4K and 4K content (or if you only download 4K content), your Radarr server should NOT be designated as a 4K server.

resetPassword.description.defaultMessage: Please enter a new password for your local account.

resetPassword.email.label.defaultMessage: Please enter the email address associated to your Local account.

resetPassword.email.note.defaultMessage: Note that Plex users must reset their password from the {plexLogo} login window.

resetPassword.email.sent.label.defaultMessage: Please check your email to access the reset password link.

resetPassword.email.sent.note.defaultMessage: If you do not receive it, your address may be incorrect or not associated to an existing account.

resetPassword.passwordTooShort.defaultMessage: Password is too short; should be a minimum of 8 characters

servicesSettings.bazarr.description.defaultMessage: Optionally configure the settings for your Bazarr server.

servicesSettings.downloads.description.defaultMessage: Configure the settings for the downloads service.

servicesSettings.tdarr.description.defaultMessage: Configure the settings for your Tdarr server.

servicesSettings.uptime.description.defaultMessage: Optionally configure the settings for your Uptime server. Streamarr presents your uptime link via the help centre.

servicesSettings.urlBase.leadingSlash.defaultMessage: URL Base must have a leading slash

servicesSettings.urlBase.noTrailingSlash.defaultMessage: URL Base must not end in a trailing slash

servicesSettings.validation.servername.defaultMessage: You must provide a valid server name

servicesSettings.validation.urlNoTrailin.defaultMessage: URL must not end in a trailing slash

signUp.getStartedInviteCode.defaultMessage: Get started by entering your invite code below.

signUp.plexRecommended.defaultMessage: (Plex is recommended for the best experience)

signUp.reviewDetailsConfirm.defaultMessage: Review your details below and confirm your account.

sonarrSettings.description.defaultMessage: Configure your Sonarr server(s) below. You can connect multiple Sonarr servers, but only two of them can be marked as defaults (one non-4K and one 4K). Administrators are able to override the server(s) used to process new events.

sonarrSettings.no4kDefault.defaultMessage: A 4K Sonarr server must be marked as default in order to enable new 4K Sonarr events.

sonarrSettings.noDefaultServer.defaultMessage: At least one Sonarr server must be marked as default in order for tv show events to be processed.

sonarrSettings.single4kWarning.defaultMessage: If you only have a single sonarr server for both non-4K and 4K content (or if you only download 4K content), your Sonarr server should NOT be designated as a 4K server.

userPermissions.admin.description.defaultMessage: Full administrator access. Bypasses all other permission checks.

userPermissions.advancedInvites.descript.defaultMessage: Grant permission to make invites with unlimited uses and never expire. Users with this permission can also modify the invites Plex downloads permission and code.

userPermissions.createEvents.description.defaultMessage: Grant permission to create custom events

userPermissions.createInvites.descriptio.defaultMessage: Grant permission to create invites (in accordance to their quotas).

userPermissions.error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong while saving user permissions.

userPermissions.manageInvites.descriptio.defaultMessage: Grant permission to manage invites. All invites made by a user with this permission can be modified.

userPermissions.manageUsers.description.defaultMessage: Grant permission to manage users. Users with this permission cannot modify users with or grant the Admin privilege.

userPermissions.request.description.defaultMessage: Grant permission to access requests (note: access in overseerr must be granted as well)

userPermissions.streamarr.description.defaultMessage: Grant permission to watch, request, invite and view the schedule.

userPermissions.viewInvites.description.defaultMessage: Grants permission to view invites from other users.

userPermissions.viewSchedule.description.defaultMessage: Grant permission to view the release schedule.

userSettings.InviteSettingsDescription.defaultMessage: Initial settings associated to new invites

userSettings.cannotModifyOwnPermissions.defaultMessage: You cannot modify your own permissions

userSettings.inviteUsageLimit.defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {use per invite} other {uses per invite}}

userSettings.localLoginDescription.defaultMessage: Allow users to sign in using their email address and password, instead of Plex OAuth
